name: Shallow Heart
description:
This is a short story about a girl that betrayed her friend out of fear for own life. You can help her find redemption. But is it what she truly wants?

Features:
  • Changeable character name.
  • 4 main endings, plus 2 - 3 variations in three of them and death in action => Save often!!!
  • Some uncanny jokes.
  • Not original romantic story.
  • You can beat the game in 5 minutes.
  • You can get seasick on the ship >x<
Note: 

This is a short story made for 30 Days RPG Maker RTP Game Jam . Only default assets were used and no additional scripts.  The game was built on RPG Maker MZ trial version, so, unfortunately, there can be no further modification. Unless the engine is bought.
